text: Ehsan Hajipour is a playwright, writer, director, theater producer, and a core member of the Iranian Theater Directors Association. He was born on August 12, 1987 in Tehran. His famous books include Abdolhossein Noushin. He has directed several theater plays, including Divan Theatrical, Sepanj Ranj va Shakanj, Report of a Party, and Hafez. == References == == Other websites == * Official Instagram Category:Actors from Tehran Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Iranian movie directors Category:Writers from Tehran
title: Ehsan Hajipour
